title: Banner of the Mark (6U90)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession • Hand Weapon
Game Text:	Bearer must be a [Rohan] companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this possession to liberate a site.
Lore:	”'Fell deeds awake. Now for wrath. Now for ruin, and the red dawn.'”
Rarity:	U
